page.title: 11OUR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is called Carleton Green County Primary School. It has 264 pupils. It is a junior and infant school and it has been open ten years. There are 7 classes in the school and 13 staff. We have one caretaker and he is very friendly. The reception infants start school at 2 different times of the year, the older ones in September and the slightly younger ones in January. The time we start school is 9:00am and we finish at 3:30pm. The infants have 2 playtimes, a 15 minute morning and afternoon playtime and a 1 hour 45 minute dinner break .The juniors have no afternoon playtime.
